column.name: regionId
column.comment: 所属地区 引用DictRegion表的主键

property.name: regionCategory
property.formula: (select r.category from region r where r.id=regionId)

column.name: telephone
column.comment: 医院联系电话，多个的用逗号分隔

column.name: introduce
column.comment: 介绍文章，存HTML编码的文档，用于前端页面的展示

column.name: updateTime
column.comment: 记录最后一次修改时间

property.name: provinceName
property.formula: (select r.name from region r where substring(r.id,1,3)=substring(regionId,1,3) and (r.category=1 or r.category=2 or r.category=3 or r.category=4))

property.name: provinceId
property.formula: (select r.id from region r where substring(r.id,1,3)=substring(regionId,1,3) and (r.category=1 or r.category=2 or r.category=3 or r.category=4))

property.name: cityId
property.formula: (select r.id from region r where substring(r.id,1,4)=substring(regionId,1,4) and (r.category=5 or r.category=6))

property.name: countryId
property.formula: (select r.id from region r where r.id=regionId and (r.category=7 or r.category=8))
